name: Subnautilus
description:
Ahoy Laddie! 

I be lookin' fer me next crew mate fer me trusted submarine Betty. Ye got yer vision still wit' ye? Can yer ears still pick up the sound o' rats? Can ye keep up wit' me drinkin'? Har har har! 'tis a job fer ye! We harvest the oceans fer wet stuff 'n sell the booty. Wit' the surplus we upgrade our ships. Please help me find the loot I once lost on the bottom o' this trench... 

[Instructions on how to play!] 

  • Move/ Navigate shop: "WASD keys" or "Left Stick"
  • Rotate: "E key" and "Q key" or "Right Trigger" and "Left Trigger". 
  • Pick Up/ Buy items: "Left Mouse button" or "A Button" 
  • Drop/ Sell items: "Right Mouse button" or "B Button"
  • The red bar indicates the Hull integrity. If you damage the hull too much, you die. NOTE, you can only get back hull integrity with upgrades 
  • The blue bar indicates the Oxygen meter. If you run out of Oxygen, you die. NOTE, go to the surface to replenish Oxygen.
  • The yellow bar indicates the Pressure meter. If you dive too deep you will start taking Hull damage from the pressure. 

[Known bugs] 

  • Shop feedback, visual and audio might not work at all. 
  • Might not be able to restart the game.
